blockers.title: File Path Divergence
blockers.description: Claude Code (terminal) and other AI agents see different absolute paths
blockers.impact: Cross-agent coordination impossible, session handoffs fail
blockers.solution: Use relative paths only + .mosaic/ JSON state
blockers.resolution_progress: Phase 1/7 in progress - creating JSON state files

blockers.title: Railway Deployment Timeout
blockers.description: railway up times out due to 45MB upload size limit
blockers.solution: Switch to GitHub-based deployment (user approved D4)

blockers.title: Railway CLI Linking Ambiguity
blockers.description: railway link fails with 'Project not found'
blockers.solution: GitHub deployment makes CLI linking unnecessary
blockers.resolution: GitHub-based deployment eliminates need for CLI linking

blockers.title: Documentation Overload
blockers.description: 131 session docs + 500+ total markdown files create confusion
blockers.impact: Agents waste time reading stale docs, cannot find canonical state
blockers.resolution_progress: User approved D2 - archiving script ready to execute in Phase 4
